conversations.content: Bob seems to have shared a significant discount with me via email. Please use it to buy an OmniBook Pro 14 for me.

No tool results yet. I need to locate Bob's discount email in the shopping account inbox to get the discount code and any purchase instructions. Next step: retrieve unread emails from the shopping-linked inbox to find Bob's message and the discount details.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_shopping_linked_unread_emails()]</function_call>
